actions.name: Operate Hatch
effects: Open or close a hatchway that's access point is within the opératif's portée de contrôle.
Un opératif can perform this action during a Ruée or Repositionner action, and any remaining move distance can be used after it does so.
conditions: Un opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if that hatchway is open and its access point is within an opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle.

actions.name: Breach
effects: Open a closed breach point thats access point is within the opératif's portée de contrôle.

Un opératif that has the word(s) "breach marker", "grenadier" or "mine" on its datacard, or has a weapon with the Piercing 2 or Piercing Crits 2 weapon rule (excluding weapons that have the Blast or Torrent weapon rule) can perform this action for 1 less AP (to a minimum of 1AP), but it cannot do so during an activation/contre-attaque in which it performed the Charge or Tirer action (or vice versa).

Roll one D6 separately for each opératif that's on the other side of the access point and has that access point within its portée de contrôle: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that opératif's APL stat until the end of its next activation and inflict damage on it equal to the dice result halved (rounding up).
conditions: Un opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of Un opératif, or if that breach point is open.

actions.name: Open Stockade Door
effects: Open a stockade terrain feature that has a door, if the inside of its breach point is within the opératif's portée de contrôle.
conditions: Un opératif cannot perform this action if it's on the outside of the stockade, if that stockade is already open or it doesn't have a door.
packs: zone de combat Upgrade: Compound Siege

actions.name: Praise / Blaspheme
effects: Shuffle one card from your hand, or two of your discarded cards, back into their respective deck(s). Note that your discarded cards are potentially worth VPs at the end of the battle, so doing so could affect this.
conditions: Un opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or while more than 3" from the shrine statue terrain feature's plinth.

actions.name: Hallow / Defile
effects: One shrine statue terrain feature l'opératif actif controls is hallowed/defiled.
conditions: Un opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, if it doesn't control the shrine statue terrain feature, or if the shrine statue has already been hallowed/defiled during this point tournant.
